text: Highway to Hell is the sixth studio album by the rock group, AC/DC. It was released on 27 July 1979 and was the last to feature Bon Scott who would die on 19 February 1980. == Track listing == # "Highway to Hell" 3:29 # "Girls Got Rhythm" 3:24 # "Walk All Over You" 5:10 # "Touch Too Much" 4:28 # "Beating Around the Bush" 3:55 # "Shot Down in Flames" 3:23 # "Get It Hot" 2:35 # "If You Want Blood (You've Got It)" 4:38 # "Love Hungry Man" 4:18 # "Night Prowler" 6:13 == References == Category:1979 albums Category:AC/DC albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Albert Productions albums
title: Highway to Hell
